**Excerpt from site:** The CCES is a 50,000+ person national stratified sample survey administered by YouGov. Half of the questionnaire consists of [Common Content](http://projects.iq.harvard.edu/cces/book/common-content) asked of all 50,000+ people, and half of the questionnaire consists of Team Content designed by each individual participating team and asked of a subset of 1,000 people.

1.  Link to datasets here: <https://tischcollege.tufts.edu/research-faculty/research-centers/cooperative-election-study>
